text: jo log apane-aap par atyaachaar karate hai, jab farishte us dasha mein unake praan grast kar lete hai, to kahate hai, "tum kis dasha mein pade rahe?" ve kahate hai, "ham dharatee mein nirbal aur bebas the." farishte kahate hai, "kya allaah kee dharatee vistrt na thee ki tum usamen ghar-baar chhodakar kaheen or chale jaate?" to ye vahee log hai jinaka thikaana jahannam hai. - aur vah bahut hee bura thikaana hai
